title: Drawing, "Blue armchair with open a", 20th century
medium: Chalk, brush and watercolor on brown paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower center: DESIGNED BY ALFONS BACH
description: Drawing of an armchair facing left.  Frame made of a light colored wood and an open back.  A speckle patterned blue bottom cushion as well as a narrow cushion for the chair back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Blue armchair with open a", 20th century.
20th century. Chalk, brush and watercolor on brown paper. Gift of Alfons Bach. 1993-108-181.
